### Example R Code

```{r}
# Generate some random data
set.seed(123)
data <- data.frame(
  x = 1:10,
  y = rnorm(10, mean = 5, sd = 2)
)

# Display the data
head(data)
```

### Example Plot

```{r}
# Create a plot
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(title = "Sample Plot", x = "X Value", y = "Y Value")
```

### Summary Statistics

```{r}
# Calculate summary statistics
summary(data)
```
